name: Cyberdramon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may play 1 [Ryo Akiyama] from your hand without paying its memory cost.[Your Turn] While you have no Tamers in play, this Digimon can't attack players.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking][Once Per Turn] If you have 2 or more black Tamers in play, ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon. (Trash 1 card from the top of one of your opponent's Digimon. If it has no digivolution cards, or becomes a level 3 Digimon, you can't trash any more cards.)
